name: FireFly - Running out of Power
description:
*Update - 1 line fix for level loading, and removed extra keys bug

Welcome to my entry to the Corona/Defold Jam.

Designed  on the LD theme 'Running out of Power'.

Trailer.

You're trapped in a mine, and your light is running out of power! Catch a firefly to temporarily light your way as you search for the exit..

Shoutout to PonyWolf for some of the shell I started with.
